name: luascript
description: LUASCRIPT Programming Language - JavaScript to Lua transpiler with Phase 1D features

scripts.test: node test/test_transpiler.js && node tests/test_arrow_functions.js && node tests/test_memory_management.js
scripts.demo: node src/transpiler.js examples/phase1b_demo.js examples/phase1b_demo.lua && luajit examples/phase1b_demo.lua
scripts.start: node -e "console.log('LUASCRIPT Phase 1D - Use require() to import modules')"

author: LUASCRIPT Development Team
